title: AKDMKS : Akademiks clothing : 006 : "Jeanius Blackletter”
content:
Akademiks is an NYC-based clothing company, established in 1999. I am posting a series of fonts used by Akademiks. Please help me ID the fonts.

“Jeanius Blackletter”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508004919im_/http:/typophile.com/files/626_1000_Akademiks_Boys_zoom_01_5914.jpg)

006
author: dirtcastle

comments.content:
JEANIUS might be a font, but AKDMKS doesn't appear to be, the letters look crude and the K's are different.

- Mike Yanega
